sms_masteryPanel.mustBeDockedHullmods: Must be docked at a market to build in hullmods.
sms_masteryPanel.mustBeDockedMasteries: Must be docked at a market to change active masteries
sms_masteryPanel.buildInOverMaxWarning: Warning: building in additional S-mods will incur a DP penalty

sms_descriptions.reduceSModCreditsCost: Increases the credits cost of building in hullmods by %s.
sms_descriptions.reduceSModCreditsCostNeg: Reduces the credits cost of building in hullmods by %s.
sms_descriptions.reduceSModMPCost: Increases the mastery point cost of building in hullmods by %s, down to a minimum of %s.
sms_descriptions.reduceSModMPCostNeg: Reduces the mastery point cost of building in hullmods by %s.
sms_descriptions.reduceRestorationCost: Increases the cost of restoring damaged ships by %s.
sms_descriptions.reduceRestorationCostNeg: Reduces the cost of restoring damaged ships by %s.
sms_descriptions.enableSModRemoval: Grants the ability to clear S-mods from ships.
sms_descriptions.enableSModRemovalPost: All S-mods must be removed. Costs nothing and refunds nothing.
sms_descriptions.allowOverCapacitySModsSingle: Grants the ability to bypass the standard S-mod limit, enabling installation of an additional %s S-mod
sms_descriptions.allowOverCapacitySModsPlural: Grants the ability to bypass the standard S-mod limit, enabling installation of an additional %s S-mods.
sms_descriptions.allowOverCapacitySModsPost: DP is increased by %s for each installed S-mod past the normal limit, rounded up.
sms_descriptions.boostOtherMasteries: Increases the effectiveness of all other mastery bonuses by %s.
sms_descriptions.boostOtherMasteriesNeg: Reduces the effectiveness of all other mastery bonuses by %s.
sms_descriptions.boostOtherMasteriesPost: Doesn't affect mastery bonuses that aren't scalable. May not affect some flat boosts as integer bonuses are rounded down.
sms_descriptions.increaseFluxByShieldUpkeep: Increases flux dissipation by %s and flux capacity by %s of shield upkeep cost.
sms_descriptions.increaseFluxByShieldUpkeepNeg: Reduces flux dissipation by %s and flux capacity by %s of shield upkeep cost.
sms_descriptions.increaseFluxByShieldUpkeepPost: No effect if the ship has no shields.
sms_descriptions.increaseRangeIfNoBonuses: Increases base ballistic and energy weapon ranges by %s if not affected by any other bonuses.
sms_descriptions.increaseRangeIfNoBonusesNeg: Reduces base ballistic and energy weapon ranges by %s if not affected by any other bonuses.
sms_descriptions.increaseRangeIfNoBonusesPost: Only counts base range bonuses. Conditional bonuses such as those occurring past a threshold do not negate this effect.

sms_misc.effectCantBeDeactivatedWarning: Warning: effect can't be deactivated once active
